sentences.en: Beds on both sides of the room were laden with corpse - like figures.
sentences.cn: 两边的几张木板床上摆了一些死尸似的身体.

sentences.en: He identified the corpse as the criminal hunted after.
sentences.cn: 他认出那具尸体就是那个被追捕的罪犯.

sentences.en: He put the corpse down the well.
He recoiled at the sight of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 他见到体厌恶得止步不前.

sentences.en: He sat by the corpse all night, weeping in bitter earnest.
sentences.cn: 他整夜坐在尸体旁边, 真挚地苦苦悲泣.

sentences.en: It was her corpse, without a doubt.
The bloated corpse was taken from the river.
sentences.cn: 从河里捞起一具被水浸胀了的尸体.

sentences.en: The corpse was found by children playing in the woods.
sentences.cn: 这具尸体是在林子里玩耍的孩子发现的。

sentences.en: The corpse was preserved from decay by embalming.
sentences.cn: 尸体用香料涂抹以防腐烂.

sentences.en: The corpse was sewn up in a sack and thrown into the river.
sentences.cn: 尸体缝好后被装入布袋中抛入河流之中.

sentences.en: The opened battered mouth of the corpse bothered him.
sentences.cn: 死人的嘴巴给砸得成了个大窟窿,他觉得刺眼.

sentences.en: The scorching torrent was enough to wither the face of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 这一阵激流似的痛骂,大可以使死人面上失色.

sentences.en: They beheld in that fearful countenance - the very image of a corpse!
sentences.cn: 他们瞧见那个可怖的面容活象一具尸首.

sentences.en: They saw the corpse sprawled on the steps.
sentences.cn: 他们看到那具尸体四肢伸开躺在台阶上.

sentences.en: What she saw was just an unfeeling corpse.
sentences.cn: 她见到的只是一具全无感觉的尸体.

trans.tran_en: the dead body of a person
